entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:46 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 09:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: E 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain mixed with freezing rain this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 near noon then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
